fig= plt.figure(figsize=(8,4), dpi=100)
ax = fig.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
groups = ['A', 'B', 'AB', 'O']
population = [30,24,8,38]
groups_loc = np.arange(len(groups))  
rects= ax.bar(groups_loc, population,width=0.50,color=["#ff5c33","#4d94ff","#79ff4d","#ffff66"], label='Blood Group');

ax.set_xlabel('Blood Groups')
ax.set_ylabel('Number Of People')
ax.set_title('Observations Blood Groups',fontsize=20)
ax.set_xticks(groups_loc)
plt.legend(loc="upper left")
ax.set_xticklabels(groups)
ax.bar_label(rects)
fig.tight_layout()

fig = plt.figure(figsize=(8,4), dpi=100)
ax = fig.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
groups = ['A', 'B', 'AB', 'O']
population = [30,24,8,38] 
ax.pie(population, labels = groups,explode = (0.05,0.05,0.05,0.05), shadow = True, startangle = 90,autopct='%1.2f%%',
       colors = ['#ff4000','#00ff80','#0000ff','#ff0080']);
ax.legend(title = "Blood Groups:",bbox_to_anchor=(1, 1), loc='upper left')
ax.set_title('Observations Blood Groups',fontsize=15)
